abstract: Obedience competition will be added to 2016 Westminster Kennel Club dog show.
lead_paragraph: The new event, on Feb. 15, will feature 35 competitors vying for top dog at sitting, heeling, jumping, retrieving and performing other exercises on cue.

headline.main: Westminster Kennel Club Adds Obedience Competition

snippet: The new event, on Feb. 15, will feature 35 competitors vying for top dog at sitting, heeling, jumping, retrieving and performing other exercises on cue.
